CustomField.description: This field controls the number of digits a large number (1 million and above) is round off to, and displayed on the Set Targets table.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to define the round-off digits to be displayed for large numbers (> 1 million) in the view-only mode (e.g. submitted results, viewing targets on Add Results page etc.) on the Add Results page. Please assign a value from 0 to 5 only.
CustomField.label: Round Off Digits For Large Numbers
